samples.current_output: Steps: 1) TNREGINET (tnreginet.gov.in)-à®²à¯ document draft, 2) E-stamp purchase, 3) Appointment book, 4) Sub-Registrar office visit (buyer, seller, 2 witnesses), 5) Biometric verification, 6) Document scan & registration. Required: Sale deed, EC, Patta, ID proofs, photos.

samples.instruction: Kadan kodutten, thirumba thara maattengaraanga - legal option?
samples.current_output: Amount based: <Rs.20,000 - Small Causes Court. >Rs.20,000 - Civil Court (money suit). Documents: Promissory note, acknowledgment, bank transfer proof, witnesses. Cheque bounce: NI Act 138 (criminal). Interest: 18% per annum claim possible. Limitation: 3 years.

Rejection reason check: passportindia.gov.in. Common reasons: Police verification issue, document mismatch, pending cases. Appeal: Regional Passport Officer. Court case pending: NOC from court required. Reapply with correct documents. Tatkaal for urgent cases.

samples.instruction: Owner thideernu current cut pannitaar, legal-aa?

Actions: 1) Police complaint (criminal intimidation), 2) Rent Authority complaint, 3) Civil court injunction. Owner penalty: Fine + imprisonment possible. Tenant rights: Continue staying + demand restoration. Document everything - photos, videos.

TN Court Fees Act based: Property suits - value based (1-10%), Money suits - amount based, Injunction - fixed fee. Consumer forum: Free up to Rs.5 lakh. Lok Adalat: No fee. Poor litigants: Court fee exemption available. e-payment: ecourts.gov.in.

Aama. TN Forest Act + TN Preservation of Private Forests Act. Permission: District Forest Officer (forest land), Corporation/Municipality (urban area). Violations: Fine + imprisonment. Protected species: Sandalwood, Rosewood - strict restrictions. Compensatory plantation required.

FSSAI: Manufacturer license cancel aagalam. Health affected: Medical bills + additional compensation.
